bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference

Plot Exonic Mapping Rate

Plot Exonic Mapping Rate

plotExonicMappingRate(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
plotExonicMappingRate(object, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
plotExonicMappingRate(object,
  interestingGroup = "sampleName", passLimit = 60L, flip = TRUE)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
interestingGroup

Optional. Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
passLimit

Threshold to plot pass color marker.
flip

Flip X and Y axes.

Value

ggplot.

See also

Other Quality Control Plots: plot53Bias, plotCountDensity, plotCountsPerGene, plotGenderMarkers, plotGeneSaturation, plotGenesDetected, plotGene, plotIntronicMappingRate, plotMappedReads, plotMappingRate, plotRRNAMappingRate, plotTotalReads

Examples

data(bcb)

# bcbioRNADataSet
plotExonicMappingRate(bcb)

# data.frame
metrics(bcb) %>% plotExonicMappingRate
